body:
*Compeleted basic UI for both view port below 900 and a second interface for viewport above 900. 
*Added basic UI loop for updating UI elements. 
*Added basic options for welcome page and creating character.
Added keyboard control and screen reader support

* Added random events for treasure and combat.
*Created creatures and designed the math needed to generate said creatures.
*Added hunting and resting 
*Added font awesome for basic iconcs.
* Moved all UI methods into their own class.

* Moved combat to its own class.

*Changed race base stats to be more in line with low level creatures

* Made the creature class self-contained and no longer create an anonymous creature object for battles.

* Changed the way messages are sent to the UI to batch send them rather than one at a time. This should improve screen reader experience and cut down on painting of the game messages.

* Fixed bug that made creatures not hit very often.

* Fixed bug that allowed users to move before their character was created which would end in an infinite loop of death.

* Fixed a bug where an out of bounds treasure would be selected resulting in an exception.

* Fixed a bug that allowed for 0 gold or 0 experience from a treasure

* Added towns, which can be found at multiples of 100. Examples (100,100), (200,-200), (-100,-100).

* Fixed a bug that caused a creature's base stats to be increased each time that type of creature was spawned. Making creatures in lower circles become far too big.

* Added named areas to circles.

* Added ability to save/load from localStorage.

* Added Dark Mode

* Added ability to collapse character info

* Broke character and inventory into two sections

* Balanced UI elements to fit better on widths as low as 300.

* Fixed a bug that didn't break your armor at the end of its life.

* Fixed a bug that allowed you to buy way too much sword.
